page.title: 04Housing, Ardfern/Craignish.
page.content: There are 37 houses in the defined map area of the village (13 of trad- itional style using local stone & 24 of more modern construction). 8 were Council built (some now privately own- ed). 9 of the 37 are second or holiday homes. All but one (a farmhouse)of the other 28 are occupied all year. In addition there are a further 7 houses either under construction or recently completed but not yet occupied. There are also 13 caravans or mobile homes (not counting any touring vans or those sited near farm buildings). 8 of these 13 are for holiday use only. Very few houses are available for renting although some holiday homes are offered as 'Winter lets'. It would seem that there is little demand for Council housing and none available anyway!
